Address.label: Address
Address.value: 1 FREEDOM VALLEY DRIVE, OAKS, Pennsylvania, 19456, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: SEI Investments provides investment processing, management, and operations services to financial institutions, asset managers, asset owners, and financial advisors in four material segments: private banks, investment advisors, institutional investors, and investment managers. SEI also has a minority interest in LSV Asset Management, a value equity asset manager with about $99 billion in assets under management. As of Dec. 21, SEI (including LSV) manages, administers, or advises on over $1.3 trillion in assets.
